query:
SELECT cc.componentName, cc.componentType, cc.allowableStress, cc.jointEfficiency, cc.actualThickness, cc.minimumThickness, cc.timeSpan, i.vesselTag 
FROM componentCalculations cc 
JOIN professionalReports pr ON cc.reportId = pr.id 
JOIN inspections i ON pr.inspectionId = i.id 
WHERE i.vesselTag = '54-11-005' 
ORDER BY cc.componentName
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vRv1t5JdAedAFZ.807c3fab4c80 --database A4XPjAmiHcgmrps2ZTa96H --execute SELECT cc.componentName, cc.componentType, cc.allowableStress, cc.jointEfficiency, cc.actualThickness, cc.minimumThickness, cc.timeSpan, i.vesselTag 
FROM componentCalculations cc 
JOIN professionalReports pr ON cc.reportId = pr.id 
JOIN inspections i ON pr.inspectionId = i.id 
WHERE i.vesselTag = '54-11-005' 
ORDER BY cc.componentName
